The device technology base application deep brain TMS mean repetitive pulse train predetermine frequency . The Brainsway DTMS study randomize , 10 week , double blind , multi-center trial compare active DTMS treatment sham treatment .
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation Safety Efficacy dTMS Treatment OCD
DOC.detailed_description: The OCD study compare one group OCD subject receive DTMS treatment ( HAC-coil ) second group OCD subject receive sham treatment ( sham coil ) . The treatment group receive 5 week daily DTMS treatment follow 4 treatment week 6 , total 29 treatment session . The control group receive treatment sham coil . Subjects may continue take SSRI medication ( prescribe ) antidepressant medication taper prior first treatment . SSRI medication approve OCD include Fluoxetine ( Prozac , Sarafem , Symbyax ) , Fluvoxamine ( Luvox , Luvox CR ) , Paroxetine ( Paxil , Paxil CR , Pexeva ) Sertraline ( Zoloft ) . Efficacy assess use Yale-Brown Obsessive Compulsive Scale score ( YBOCS ) , well efficacy scale . Safety assess monitor adverse event , vital sign , physical neurological examination use certain safety questionnaire .
